html: 6.20.17  7:03 pm   Are you going to continue to make "joke" music but also pursue "real" music?
6.20.17  6:45 pm   why haven't you posted on your youtube channel for a while?
6.20.17  6:40 pm   What hurdles did you have to jump to get "got to know what's going on" done as quick as possible. Or really, what made it hard?

6.20.17  6:24 pm   A lot of your reality videos seem to have you expressing depression and/or anxiety over getting things done and having a lot of ideas to do or no ideas. Do you think in the past year or two you've moved away from this and are happier/more satisfied?
6.20.17  5:54 pm   You ever think about creating an interactive quiz of random interesting stuff? It's just an idea. Like just something on this site that takes the person on an adventure?
6.20.17  5:15 pm   Why do you swear so much
6.20.17  5:03 pm   Why does this text box not allow me to hit enter and type in the second sentence in a new line?

6.20.17  3:54 pm   in your reality section (which is proably my favourite part of the website because its really inspiring) you often reffered to yourself as "we". is it because you work with some colleagues or you just like to refer to yourslef in that way.
6.20.17  3:17 pm   what's something you wish you could do with your current music studio recording setup but can't?
6.20.17  3:13 pm   Why did you leave so quickly at the shorty awards

6.20.17  1:28 pm   Which one of these is the most correct interpretation of your creative process for making long videos? 1. research - narration - vocal melodies - chords - graphics 2. research - narration - chords - vocal melodies - graphics 3. research - narration - graphics - chords - vocal melodies 4. Just feel it, man. Fuck the process. 5. Listen to more records, close the Real Book.

6.19.17  2:50 am   Hey bill. You are awesome and a huge role model of mine. I really love your song new cannan. Do you think you will continue to make longer (ish) songs like that. Keep it real and watch movies all day till you puke
6.19.17  1:11 am   How would you classify your own singing voice?
6.19.17  1:07 am   How do I stop pushing people away?

6.19.17  1:01 am   You said recently "i will be doing songs til the cows come home". In your song "i can play" there's a section in the lyrics that contain the same phrase (til the cows come home), and it even is presented with the same characteristics as your answer for the question of 6.17.17 11:06 am. So, does that mean that this week's music is a follow up to the song "i can play" or is it related in any other way to the refered composition? Please don't answer with something like "i can't tell", i hope that makes sense.
6.19.17  12:50 am   will your new song cure my depression?
6.19.17  12:39 am   yo bill, is the new song finished? answer it and drop a crazy hint about it, if you want to of course

6.19.17  12:13 am   hallo! I wanted to ask you about I's, as I don't run into many other people who do not follow the capitalization guidelines just as they are given. I capitalize names as a measure of respect, and I consider I to be a name (your name for yourself when you are conveying yourself to someone else) but with how often I's turn up in text, it can feel self centered to capitalize it so often. do you think I should consider changing my policy?
6.18.17  10:47 pm   Have you ever thought about putting your music on Google Play?

6.18.17  10:10 pm   I love your "harmonizing the weather lady" video and "the high class stuff" video. I want to try doing something similar (mimicking speech with music).. I think that would be a cool way to incorporate spoken word parts in songs.. but I can't seem to get the hang of it. Any tips? What was your process when writing the music to those videos?
6.18.17  9:44 pm   Hey Bill, why not upload the songs you've made right after you finished them, and not wait until Tuesday? I think it would make things a bit faster.
6.18.17  9:20 pm   If you release the song after Tuesday, that day could be the new day for releasing songs each week. Would this be constant, logical evolution, or would it be a temptress from Hell?
